name: The Survivor (itch) (p_dig_q)
description:
Thank you for playing this game.

Prototype for a zombie survival game, tested on a laptop with RTX3050. This game is heavy.   Run "Prototype.exe" to play the game.

-----Controls-----

W/A/S/D Key:  Move

Mouse Left Click:  Shoot

Mouse Scroll Wheel:  Switch Weapon

R Key:  Reload

Esc key:  Show Mouse Cursor

Pause key:  Pause

--------------------

(Unity 2021.3.15)
